page.title: 11Travelling in Basingstoke
page.content: { Travelling around Basingstoke}is an awkward thing because there is so much {traffic}and so many{roundabouts.}The M3 Spur Road joins the Ring Road at {Blackdam Roundabout.}We counted about 1680 vehicles going round it in one hour.When there is a{traffic jam}you just have to sit in the car and wait for your turn to move. Then when it's your turn to move you move quite slowly. When there is no traffic jam the cars go whizzing round there.There are up to 450{accidents}yearly,bad ones too.Sometimes they are just minor ones but they all cause alot of trouble like dents in your car,people dead and hurt and sometimes even with brain damage. It is dangerous to cross the{Ring Road}and you could easily be knocked over.There are several{subways and{foot-bridges}around Basingstoke.
